name: Yo Ho, Oh No! An Anxious Pirate's Tale
name_original: Yo Ho, Oh No! An Anxious Pirate's Tale
description:
-------------------------------------------

Gameplay Time: about 40 - 60 minutes

--------------------------------------------------

"Ahoy there landlubbers!"

"Control Edward, Mary or Avery, three amateur pirates who wish to find the Golden Chalice!

The tale will be tailored to your decisions throughout! Whether you're a ruthless pirate or a passive one."

Gameplay:

- Your goal is to retrieve the Golden Chalice, a treasure that would turn anyone into a legendary pirate!

- Whether it's with swordfights, fighting other pirate ships or using your words, you can interact with the world in many distinct ways.

- Meet your crew members and learn more about their histories, as well as the origin stories that led them to the pirates' life.

-Save your progress and reutrn to it later on. Given the time it would take to finish the story, it's always handy if you need a break :)

"Good luck with your journey, matey, and I hope you make the right decisions!

--------------------------------------------------

Images Used
